Package controller

Class PhotoController

java.lang.Object
controller.PhotoController
public class PhotoController
extends java.lang.Object
Highest level controller that controls all substates and all other controllers.

    • start

    • processEvent

      public void processEvent​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      Method that is called when any controller calls their handleEvent method. Deligates the event to the PhotoState that corresponds to the current state of the system.
      Parameters:
      e - ActionEvent object obtained when an event is triggered.
